channel.title: Jean-Emmanuel Deluxe – Lost In The Grooves

item.title: French sunshine pop & continental bubblegum
item.dc:creator: Jean-Emmanuel Deluxe
item.category: Swinging book in France in the making!!!
item.description: Hi I’m working on a new book for the french publisher, Les cahiers du rock- So for the first time i think i’ll write about French bubblegum & sunshine pop- I will write about US & UK bubblegum & sunshine pop too- Keep in mind that no such book was published in France on that … Continue reading "French sunshine pop & continental bubblegum"
item.content:encoded:
Hi

I’m working on a new book for the french publisher, Les cahiers du rock-
So for the first time i think i’ll write about French bubblegum & sunshine pop-
I will write about US & UK bubblegum & sunshine pop too- Keep in mind that no such book was published in France on that topic, so i will be the first-
What i would like is your help for this book!! So if you can find me great info & tips i’ll send you copies of the book & put you on the credits-
I’m working on a comp too-
More news soon-
Please contact me:
d-luxe@wanadoo.fr
